src_original: tatra pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃdhāraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 其地性者，能受種子。

src_original: abdhāturbījaṃ snehayati /  tejodhāturbījaṃ paripācayati /  vāyudhāturbījamabhinirharati /
tgt_original: 水性者，能潤種子。 火性者，能熟種子。 風性者，能增長種子。

src_original: ākāśadhāturbījasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karotīti /
tgt_original: 空性者，能為種子作無礙。

src_original: yadā bāhyaśca pṛthivīdhāturavikalo bhavati,  evamaptejovāyvākāśaṛtudhātavaścāvikalā bhavanti,  tataḥ savaṣāṃ samavāyādbīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
tgt_original: 若離此緣則種子不生，如地性能受種子、水性能潤種子、火性能熟種子、風性能增長種子、空性能無礙種子，賴時節故種子增長，種子增長故生芽。

src_original: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījasya saṃdhāraṇakṛtyaṃ karomḥti /  evamabdhātorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjaṃ snehayāmḥti /  tejodhātorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjaṃ paripācayāmḥti /  vāyudhātorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjamabhinirharāmḥti /
tgt_original: 其地性者亦不言我能受種子、水性者亦不言我能潤種子、火性者亦不言我能熟種子、空性者亦不言我能為種子作無礙、種子亦不念言我藉此等緣能得增長。

src_original: sa ca aṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto (na caikakāraṇādhḥno)  atha punaḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśaṛtudhātusamavāyād bḥje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
tgt_original: 其此芽亦非自作、亦非共作、亦非自在天作、亦非無因生，皆從地水火風空種子時節故生芽。

src_original: evaṃ bāhyasya pratḥtyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ //  tatra bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhirākārairdraṣṭavyaḥ /  katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ?
tgt_original: 此外因緣應作五事觀察：

src_original: na śāśvatataḥ,  nocchedataḥ,  na saṃkrāntitaḥ,  parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ,  tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśca /
tgt_original: 非常、非斷、非傳度、藉緣故果實增廣、從相似生。

src_original: kathaṃ na śāśvatata iti?  yasmādanyo 'ṅkuraḥ anyadbījam /
tgt_original: 言非常者，此種滅故言非常。

src_original: na ca ya evāṅkuraḥ tadeva bījam /  na ca niruddhādbījādaṅkura utpadyate nāpyaniruddhāt /  bījaṃ punarnirudhyate,  tadaivāṅkuraścotpadyate /
tgt_original: 即此時種滅、即此時芽生，以無障礙故，如稱低起，故言非斷。 種與芽亦不相似，故言非傳度。

src_original: yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate,  tādṛśaṃ phalamabhinirvartayatīti /  atastatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti //
tgt_original: 如是從花故生子，應如理安。

src_original: evaṃ bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhirākārairdraṣṭavyaḥ //  evamādhyātmiko 'pi pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /  katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām?
tgt_original: 如是外因緣，應二種觀察。 如是內因緣義，亦應二種觀察：

src_original: yadidaṃ hetūpanibandhataḥ pratyayopanibandhataśca /
tgt_original: 一從因、二從緣。

src_original: tatrādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamaḥ?
tgt_original: 其內緣從因義何也？

src_original: yadidamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ,  yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti /  avidyā cennābhaviṣyat,
tgt_original: 所言無明緣行、行緣識、識緣名色、名色緣六入、六入緣觸、觸緣受、受緣愛、愛緣取、取緣有、有緣生、生緣老死憂悲苦惱，次第增長。

src_original: naiva saṃskārāḥ prajñāsyante /  evaṃ yāvajjātiścennābhaviṣyat,
tgt_original: 如是等苦陰聚集增長，如是有無明故行增長，如是乃至有生故老死增長。

src_original: jarāmaraṇaṃ na prajñāsyate /  atha satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇāmabhinirvṛttirbhavati /  evaṃ yāvajjātyāṃ sattyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
tgt_original: 若無無明則不生行，若無生則無老死，如是有無明故有行增長，如是有生故有老死增長。

src_original: tatra avidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ saṃskārānabhinirvartayāmīti /  saṃskārāṇāmapi naivaṃ bhavati - vayamavidyayā abhinirvatitā iti /  evaṃ yāvajjāterapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirvartayāmīti /  jarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ jātyābhinirvartitamiti /
tgt_original: 其無明亦不念言我能造行、行亦不念言我為無明所造，乃至生亦不言我能造老死、老死亦不言我為生所造。

src_original: atha ca satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇāmabhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /  evaṃ yāvajjātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是有無明故有行增長，乃至有生故有老死增長。

src_original: katameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt?
tgt_original: 何者為六種性？

src_original: bhūtatā satyatā aviparītatā aviparyayatā iti //  atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /  katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām?  yadidaṃ hetūpanibandhataḥ pratyayopanibandhataśca /
tgt_original: 一從因、二從緣。

src_original: so 'pi dvividho draṣṭavyaḥ - bāhyaśca ādhyātmikaśca /
tgt_original: 復應作二義觀之： 一外、二內。

src_original: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamāḥ?
tgt_original: 其外因緣從因義。 何者？

src_original: yadidaṃ bījādaṅkuraḥ /  aṅkurātpatram /  patrātkāṇḍam /  kāṇḍānnālam /  nālādgaṇḍaḥ /  gaṇḍādgarbham /  puṣpāt phalam /  asati bīje aṅkuro na bhavati,  evaṃ yāvat sati puṣpe phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /  tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati - ahamaṅkuramabhinirvartayāmīti /
tgt_original: 一切過去未來諸佛種智，同說如是，以從種生芽、從芽生葉、從葉生節、從節生莖、從莖生幹、從幹生枝、從枝生蕚、從蕚生花、從花生子。

src_original: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /  evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti /
tgt_original: 若無子則不生芽，如是無花則不生子。

src_original: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ puṣpeṇābhinirvartitamiti /  atha punaḥ bīje sati aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /  evaṃ yāvat puṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
tgt_original: 有子故得生芽，如是有花故得生子。 如此，子亦不言我能生芽、芽亦不言我能自生，如是一切法如理而安。

src_original: evaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ //  kathaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ?
tgt_original: 以是義故，外因緣從因義，應如是觀，此是觀因義。 觀緣義者何！
